tag_list: thad-weinlein, animation, executive-producer, films, movies, direct-to-video, cartoon, management, entertainment, family-feature, television, cgi, 2d, 3d, los-angeles, california, universal-studios, fox, paramount-pictures
overview:
THAD WEINLEIN: Animation Producer CGI Management Specialist, brand integration and pipeline consultant also known as Executive Producer for Paramount Pictures, Universal Studios, 20th Century Fox.

Thad was former President and driving force of numerous companies both public and private, generating stockholder value by creating smart, high quality family entertainment for Motion Picture, Television, Games and Theme Park Attractions. His work can be seen worldwide, shared with such legendary film talent as Steven Spielberg, Tim Burton, and dominant Venture Capitalists such as John Doerr and Jim Breyer.
